author: sussman
msg: * autoversioning-strategy.txt:  commit my autoversioning notes for public view

author: sussman
msg: Finish issue #911: in order to build mod_dav_svn, subversion's
./configure now looks for (and requires) a specific API version of httpd.
Rather than require a specific httpd version number, we only look at
the Magic Module Number, which changes when the API breaks
compatibility with previous versions.
Big thanks to jerenkrantz for helping me with this!
* svn-apache.m4 (SVN_FIND_APACHE):  run egrep over a c preprocessor
macro as a way of checking that we're compiling against a minimal
httpd magic module number (mmn).  Thanks to jerenkrantz for
coming up with this technique.
* configure.in:  invoke SVN_FIND_APACHE with a minimal magic module number.

author: fitz
msg: Use fo xsl wrapper to generate bookmarks in the PDF of the book and
misc-docs.
Patch by: Shlomi Fish <shlomif@vipe.stud.technion.ac.il>
(Tweaked by me.)
* doc/book/Makefile: Change PDF stylesheet ref to new one. Removes
some unnecessary tabs as well.
* doc/book/tools/fo-stylesheet.xsl: New file.

author: sussman
msg: Part of issue #911: subversion's ./configure now looks for (and
requires) specific versions of APR and APR-UTIL.
*** WARNING: you *must* install the latest apr-util for this change to
work.  I just added a --version switch to apu-config last night.
Without that switch, subversion can't figure out what version of
apr-util you have.
* apr.m4 (SVN_LIB_APR):  take a version regular expression to match
against.  invoke 'apr-config --version' and compare to the regex.
* aprutil.m4 (SVN_LIB_APRUTIL):  same change: take a regex, compare to
'apu-config --version'.
* configure.in: invoke SVN_LIB_APR and SVN_LIB_APRUTIL with desired
version regexps.

author: philip
msg: Fix the test suite, I broke it with the status output change.  Fix a
memory handling bug in mod_dav_svn which something has just started
to tickle.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/update.c (upd_change_xxx_prop): Reallocate
name before storing in removed_props array.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/svntest/tree.py
(build_tree_from_status): Tweak regexp to match new format status.
